PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_PipeFittingOccurrence
PropertySetDef.Definition: Pipe segment occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcPipeSegment.

PropertyDef.Name: Color
PropertyDef.Definition: The color of the pipe segment.\X\0D \X\0D Note: This is typically used only for plastic pipe segments. However, it may be used for any pipe segments with a painted surface which is not otherwise specified as a covering.

PropertyDef.Name: InteriorRoughnessCoefficient
PropertyDef.Definition: The interior roughness coefficient of the pipe segment.
